titles.title: Quarterly Financial Report Reauthorization Act
Quarterly Financial Report Reauthorization Act
To extend by 15 years the authority of the Secretary of Commerce to conduct the quarterly financial report program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform. H. Rept. 114-237.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 179.
